summary: All-round follower. She immunity fire damage. When she feels dangerous she will conjures her sister's soul to fight for her.
descriptionHtml:
Wendy Willow The Survivor
Immune flame. When she feels dangerous she will conjures her sister's soul to fight for her.
spells: Incinerate, Flame cloak, stoneflesh, Wall of Flames, Firebolt, Flames, Conjure Abigail etc...
perks: Light Foot, Fighting Stance, Unhindered, Silence, DualSavagery, Augmented Flames2, Destruction Dual Casting, Impact  etc...
location: Candle hearth Hall Windhelm

About her sister, Abigail
Maximum level: 30
spells: WaterWalking, Ice Spike
Weapons: Elven Dagger

author: Max zhang
